name: Actea spicata

Head: Itching of scalp alternating with heat; nose red at tip, fluent coryza
Fearful, starts easily; confused
Ebullition of blood to head excited by drinking coffee
Vertigo, tearing headache, better in open air, throbbing in brain, pain from crown to between eyebrows; heat in forehead, pain in left frontal eminence as if bone were crushed
Respiratory: Short, irregular breathing at night, while lying
Shortness of breath on exposure to fresh air
Stomach: Cramp-like pains in stomach and epigastrium, with difficult breathing; sense of suffocation
Tearing, darting pains in epigastric region, with vomiting
Abdomen: Sticking pain and distension of hypogastrium
Face: Violent pain in upper jaw, running from teeth through malar bones to temples
Extremities: Swelling in joints from slight fatigue
Wrist swollen, red, worse any motion
Sudden lassitude after talking or eating
Rheumatic pains in small joints, wrist,  fingers, ankles, toes

details: Is a rheumatic remedy, especially of the SMALL JOINTS; tearing, tingling pains characterize it. WRIST-RHEUMATISM. Pulsations over whole body, especially liver and renal region. Cardiovascular spasm. Pains worse from touch and motion.
